title.rendered: Board of Education Meeting on July 1

content.rendered:
The Board of Education will hold a meeting at 8 a.m. on July 1.  The meeting will be held in the MacFadden Administration Building.

  • Visit the Board of Education page for links to the agendas.
  • Draft 2022-2023 Code of Conduct
  • Watch the meeting through webex.  Please note this meeting will be live-streamed through webex instead of youtube.
